description.narrative:
Osmangazi Elektrik Dagitim A.S. (the Company) is the electricity distribution company operating in five provinces (Afyon, Bilecik, Eskisehir, Kütahya and Usak) in inner western Anatolia, Turkey. It serves approximately 1.6 million customers. The Company is implementing its FY2017-2020 capital expenditure program of approximately US$350 million equivalent to rehabilitate, upgrade and expand its electricity distribution network (the Project).
The proposed investment will support the Companys FY2017-2020 capital expenditure program and will help contribute to improving the quality and reliability of the distribution network.

The Project will support the Company to undertake much-needed major rehabilitation and modernization of the distribution network in the OEDAS Region, helping to improve power supply quality and reliability, reduce technical and commercial losses, and expand network access to new customers. By strengthening the network and investing in new technology, the Project will also support further integration of renewable energy and help leverage information technology to improve the Company's operational efficiency and customer service capabilities.
